You act so high and mighty, you and your perfect pregnant wife Alayna. With your perfect child and your perfect home.

You weren’t always perfect. Your past is filled with misdeeds.

Does your wife know all your secrets?

Would she stand behind you if she did?

You think because she’s on bedrest you can protect her? How sweet.

Sleep tight, you two.

-An Old Friend.

review.body:
Oh Hudson and Alayna how I've missed you both.

It wasn't too long ago that I pulled an allnighter to reread the first five books in this series. Yes five books in 24 hours. Some could say that I'm crazy obsessed with this series and you would be correct.
So when I saw that we were getting Fixed F...

book.title: Ravage (Civil Corruption, #4)
book.description:
Mason Keller is broken, destructive, and the only man I’ve ever loved.
I met him when I was just a child, but I knew there would never be anyone else.
He lit my world with each smile and warmed my heart just by looking at me.
But he was my brother’s best friend...

Which meant I was off limits.

So he let me go and took my heart with him.
Now everything has changed, and the obstacles that kept us apart all our lives are no longer in the way.

He wants to claim me.
He wants to own me.
He wants to ravage my world.

And if I’m not careful...

I just might let him.

review.body:
So I've been waiting for this book. And I've been waiting for this story between Mace and Lyla.

This storyline has a bit of the forbidden element with Mace and Lyla's brother being best friends. Mace since the beginning of this series has been self destructive. Partying like there is no tomorrow...

book.title: Hale
book.description:
Note this book is only available for purchase from K Webster's website, which can be found on the author's GR page.

Warning:
This book is an epic, emotional, raw love story…
between a brother and sister.
Many won’t be able to handle that.
But if I don’t tell their story, who else will?

**********************************

He’s my everything.
I would die without him.

Because he infects me.
My brother.
He’s inside my mind.
My thoughts are black and bruised.
Twisted and wrong.
A secret that eats me alive, but one I’ll take to my grave.

And then it happens.
He sees inside me.
Understands the darkness.
Loves what he finds.

I’m contagious.

It’s true.
Now, he’s sick too.

************

Note this book is only available for purchase from K Webster's website, which can be found on the author's GR page.

review.body:
HOW !!! How is it that K Webster always manages to push me right the fuck out of my comfort zone and get me to read and love something that I would have normally said na huh no fucking way !!!!

And I’ll tell you I’ve tried a book before that deals with the topic this book deals with. I...

book.title: Dirty Sexy Player (Dirty Games Duet, #1)
book.description:
Available in audio first, New York Times best-selling author Laurelin Paige's newest red-hot romance!

Weston King knows how to play. But wild nights and owning an extensive collection of women's panties don't carry the thrill they once did, so when his business partner Donovan suggests an outrageous plan to allow them to take over their competition, Wes takes him up on the offer. The crazy idea? Marry the competitor.

Elizabeth Dyson, the bride-to-be in question, is on board with the plan. She wants access to her trust fund and can only get it once she marries. Each has something the other wants - all they have to do is pretend to like each other well enough to tie the knot.

Only trouble is, playing fiancé to Elizabeth isn't quite that simple. Wes finds her sexy and brilliant...and soon wishes their engagement wasn't fake at all. Not that he'd ever tell her that.

But a lover boy like Wes can only stand an empty bed for so long...and even the best of players has to put down his cards eventually.

review.body:
Ahhhh I loved this story. If you’ve read Dirty Filthy Rich Men then you’ve met Weston King and this is his story.

I immediately liked Weston, while he’s a playboy he’s definitely different from Donovan. While Donovan is definitely broody and crass, Weston’s personality is upbeat and he comes acro...
